content.description: Stand start with left hand on a good flat crimp/edge, move right and up to the lip, and top out. This problem is on the boulder off to the left next to the vernal pond. This problem starts a few feet right of the problem Code Violation.

Start matched in the obvious large pocket jug on the slightly overhanging face. Move right to another jug then up to a slopey ledge. Bump again for a big ledge below the lip, and top out.

 Beta video: Â https://vimeo.com/368572861.
content.location: This is basically Witness Protection Program but started one or two moves in. It is good enough to stand alone as its own problem with an obvious start. This is a nice, easy addition.

content.description: Get on the jug, throw huge for the slopey lip, and mantel. Everything to the right is off.
Stand start the small flake below the rightmost side of the horizontal crack.  Traverse all the way left, and top out.
content.location:
It is in the Remnants area on the boulder that borders the vernal pool. This is opposite the pool side. 

  This "Pool Boulder" also includes the problems Lost and Found and Witness Protection Program.

content.description: Sit start with left crimp, right hand in horizontal crack, and crappy feet. Move up and top out.
content.location: This is on the decent-sized boulder off to the left in the Remnants Area. The backside of this boulder can be flooded by the small vernal pond at certain times. Start all the way left on the side that faces the small pond.

content.description: Stand start the far left side of the boulder with a good right hand flat crimp/edge dyno to the lip and topout.
content.location: This is on the decent-sized boulder off to the left. The backside of this boulder can be flooded by the small vernal pond at certain times.

content.description: This is a decent, steep boulder located right next to a small vernal pool.
